title: How to Remove Sticky Tape from Fabric (Hot Iron Method)

steps.headline: Place a handkerchief over the area of the fabric where the sticky tape is.
steps.description: If this is on an item of clothing, you can do this on an ironing board. If it is on something like a piece of furniture, you will just have to work around what you have got and manoeuvre the iron as best you can.

steps.headline: Set the iron to hot.
steps.description: Iron over the sticky tape piece and the handkerchief. Do this quickly and gently.

steps.headline: Check the fabric to see if the sticky tape and adhesive stain have lifted.

text: Place a handkerchief over the area of the fabric where the sticky tape is. If this is on an item of clothing, you can do this on an ironing board. If it is on something like a piece of furniture, you will just have to work around what you have got and manoeuvre the iron as best you can. Set the iron to hot. Iron over the sticky tape piece and the handkerchief. Do this quickly and gently. Check the fabric to see if the sticky tape and adhesive stain have lifted. Repeat until this occurs. Finished.
